Title: Arte Libertad
AltTitle.other: Art Freedom|~|Encuentro de los artistas por la libertad de todos los presos políticos de Chile
Description.note:
SPANISH: Afiche que promociona un encuentro de diversos artistas en el Teatro Cariola por la libertad de todos los presos políticos de Chile durante la dictadura.
ENGLISH:Poster that promotes a meeting of various artists at the Teatro Cariola (Cariola Theatre) for the freedom of all political prisoners in Chile during the dictatorship.
Name.creator: Taller de Gráfica (Graphic Design Workshop)
Name.subject: Sociedad de Escritores de Chile (SECH)|~|Asociación de Pintores y Escultores de Chile (APECH)|~|Asociación Metropolitana de Folkloristas (AMFOLCHI)|~|Coordinadora de Brigadas Muralistas|~|Asociación Metropolitana de Radios Populares (ANARAP)|~|Casa de los Músicos|~|Club Tucán|~|Taller Experimental de La Victoria|~|De Kiruza|~|Grupo Chilhue|~|Inti Illimani|~|Radrigán, Juan, 1937-2016|~|Ladrón de Guevara, Matilde, 1910-2009|~|Bunster, Patricio, 1924-2006|~|Casa Kamarundi|~|Taller Cultural Peñihue|~|Productora Siglo 21|~|Taller 619|~|Revista “Punto Final”|~|Casa Aquelarre|~|Radio Umbral
Description.fundingNote: Digitization for the Centro Cultural Tallersol (Chile) collection was sponsored by the Modern Endangered Archives Program with funding from Arcadia.
Statement of Responsibility: Political prisioners commissioned Antonio Kadima to make a poster for their event
Subject: Presos Políticos|~|Presos políticos de la cárcel pública

Title: Para transformar nuestras vidas hablemos de nosotras
AltTitle.other: To transform our lives, let's talk about ourselves|~|Programa Mujer, Embarazo y Género
Description.note:
SPANISH: Afiche que promociona el Programa Mujer, Embarazo y Género del Comité de Servicio Chileno - Cuáquero realizado en tres ciudades de Chile (Santiago, Concepción y Puerto Montt).
ENGLISH:Poster that promotes the Programa Mujer, Embarazo y Género (Women, Pregnancy and Gender Program) of the Comité de Servicio Chileno - Cuaquero (Chilean Quaker Service Committee), held in three cities in Chile (Santiago, Concepción and Puerto Montt).
Name.creator: Taller de Gráfica (Graphic Design Workshop)
Description.fundingNote: Digitization for the Centro Cultural Tallersol (Chile) collection was sponsored by the Modern Endangered Archives Program with funding from Arcadia.
Statement of Responsibility: Comité de Servicio Chileno-Cuáquero (Chilean-Quaker Service Committee) commissioned Antonio Kadima to make a poster for their program "Mujer, embarazo y género" (Women, pregnancy and gender)

Title: Cristina González
